comments.body: Leaving this comment here because there is not other place. While we are refactoring them, could we ensure that both the request and the response are covered in `org.apache.kafka.common.requests.RequestResponseTest`? I had a very quick look and it seems that they are not.
Could we add a unit test for this one and the one bellow?
Do you mind adding a unit test for this one in `AlterReplicaLogDirsRequestTest` for the sake of completeness?
